engChrName: That is one very large door.
engSearchText: That is one very large door.
jpnChrName: この扉は……
jpnSearchText: この扉は……

engChrName: So I'm guessing this is our way in?
engSearchText: So I'm guessing this is our way in?
jpnChrName: フン、いかにもって感じね。
jpnSearchText: フン、いかにもって感じね。

engChrName: Yeah. We'll be doin' a lot of fighting on the other side of it.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We'll be doin' a lot of fighting on the other
side of it.
jpnChrName: ああ、この先が連中のゲームの “領域（フィールド）”ってヤツなんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この先が連中のゲームの
“領域（フィールド）”ってヤツなんだろう。

engChrName: This device must be our keycard scanner.
engSearchText: This device must be our keycard scanner.
jpnChrName: でもこの扉、機械制御みたいだ。 例のアクセスキーが要りそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
でもこの扉、機械制御みたいだ。
例のアクセスキーが要りそうだね。

engChrName: We got a couple of side paths, too, and I sense monsters on both of 'em. This place is big.
engSearchText:
We got a couple of side paths, too, and I sense
monsters on both of 'em. This place is big.
jpnChrName: ……どっちも続いてやがるな。 魔獣の気配もするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……どっちも続いてやがるな。
魔獣の気配もするぜ。

engChrName: Actually, judging by how sound is reverberating in here, I believe this area in particular is quite small.
engSearchText:
Actually, judging by how sound is reverberating in
here, I believe this area in particular is quite small.
jpnChrName: ですが反響具合から あまり広くはなさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ですが反響具合から
あまり広くはなさそうです。

engChrName: Then it won't take long to explore every nook and cranny. Let's hop to it!
engSearchText:
Then it won't take long to explore every nook
and cranny. Let's hop to it!
jpnChrName: とにかく探してみましょう！
jpnSearchText: とにかく探してみましょう！

engChrName: This'll be a cinch with Master's help.
engSearchText: This'll be a cinch with Master's help.
jpnChrName: ああ──師父（せんせい）も改めて 頼りにさせてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──師父（せんせい）も改めて
頼りにさせてもらいますよ。

engChrName: Couldn't ask for a better ally than the head of the Kunlun school. Lookin' forward to seeing you in action again.
engSearchText:
Couldn't ask for a better ally than the head of the
Kunlun school. Lookin' forward to seeing you in
action again.
jpnChrName: 東方三大武術が一、 《崑崙流》奥伝としての腕をね。
jpnSearchText:
東方三大武術が一、
《崑崙流》奥伝としての腕をね。

engChrName: And I'm looking forward to seeing how much my pupil has grown.
engSearchText:
And I'm looking forward to seeing how much my
pupil has grown.
jpnChrName: よかろう──こちらもおぬしの 成長ぶり、改めて見せてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
よかろう──こちらもおぬしの
成長ぶり、改めて見せてもらおうか。

engChrName: Oh, my!
engSearchText: Oh, my!
jpnChrName: これは……！
jpnSearchText: これは……！

engChrName: Watch out, everyone. That one means business!
engSearchText: Watch out, everyone. That one means business!
jpnChrName: 脅威度大── 気を付けてくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
脅威度大──
気を付けてくださいっ！

engChrName: I believe its placement here—a dead end— is deliberate. I'm inclined to believe we have to defeat it to proceed with the game.
engSearchText:
I believe its placement here—a dead end—
is deliberate. I'm inclined to believe we have to defeat
it to proceed with the game.
jpnChrName: フム、この行き止まりに 放たれているということは……
jpnSearchText:
フム、この行き止まりに
放たれているということは……

engChrName: Yeah. That's probably how we get our 'right to participate.'
engSearchText:
Yeah. That's probably how we get our 'right
to participate.'
jpnChrName: こいつが“参加資格”ってのに 絡んでる可能性は高そうね！
jpnSearchText:
こいつが“参加資格”ってのに
絡んでる可能性は高そうね！

engChrName: Then let's cut it down to size.
engSearchText: Then let's cut it down to size.
jpnChrName: ならやるしかねえ── 一気に片付けるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ならやるしかねえ──
一気に片付けるぞ！

engChrName: Done and done.
engSearchText: Done and done.
jpnChrName: ふう、こんなもんか。
jpnSearchText: ふう、こんなもんか。

engChrName: Oh. Look at what it dropped.
engSearchText: Oh. Look at what it dropped.
jpnChrName: あっ、見てくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: あっ、見てくださいっ！

engChrName: That's gotta be our keycard.
engSearchText: That's gotta be our keycard.
jpnChrName: これがアクセスキーか。
jpnSearchText: これがアクセスキーか。

engChrName: Perfect. We can use it to open the door, then.
engSearchText: Perfect. We can use it to open the door, then.
jpnChrName: ええ、先ほどの扉に 使うもので間違いないかと。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、先ほどの扉に
使うもので間違いないかと。

engChrName: It looks like a standard-issue security card, but it has a fairly modern design. Fascinating.
engSearchText:
It looks like a standard-issue security card, but it has
a fairly modern design. Fascinating.
jpnChrName: 見たところ、カード自体は最新式だけど よくあるセキュリティカードみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
見たところ、カード自体は最新式だけど
よくあるセキュリティカードみたいだね。

engChrName: Look, the Genesis is reacting to it.
engSearchText: Look, the Genesis is reacting to it.
jpnChrName: っ、《ゲネシス》が……
jpnSearchText: っ、《ゲネシス》が……

engChrName: Keycard acquired. You have been registered as Team Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
Keycard acquired. You have been registered as Team
Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: アクセスキー入手、 《アークライド解決事務所》を登録
jpnSearchText:
アクセスキー入手、
《アークライド解決事務所》を登録

engChrName: Wait, what?
engSearchText: Wait, what?
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: How'd they know we were the ones who picked it up?
engSearchText: How'd they know we were the ones who picked it up?
jpnChrName: カードを手に入れたとたん……！？
jpnSearchText: カードを手に入れたとたん……！？

engChrName: The hell? I don't see any cameras around. They hidden or something?
engSearchText:
The hell? I don't see any cameras around.
They hidden or something?
jpnChrName: チッ……監視カメラって わけでも無さそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
チッ……監視カメラって
わけでも無さそうだな？

engChrName: I don't think so. I'm thinking this is just part of the Genesis' surveillance system.
engSearchText:
I don't think so. I'm thinking this is just part of the
Genesis' surveillance system.
jpnChrName: うん……これも《ゲネシス》による 監視システムの一環なのかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
うん……これも《ゲネシス》による
監視システムの一環なのかもしれない。

engChrName: I am of the same mind. In this case, I believe it's confirming that we obtained our keycard.
engSearchText:
I am of the same mind. In this case, I believe it's
confirming that we obtained our keycard.
jpnChrName: ええ、わたくし達がアクセスキーを 手に入れた“事実”を判定するような。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、わたくし達がアクセスキーを
手に入れた“事実”を判定するような。

engChrName: A plausible hypothesis.
engSearchText: A plausible hypothesis.
jpnChrName: ふむ……ありそうだな。 これまでのゲネシスの情報を考えると。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……ありそうだな。
これまでのゲネシスの情報を考えると。

engChrName: We already know that system is designed to be the keeper of the rules, but I didn't realize it could monitor us so closely.
engSearchText:
We already know that system is designed to be the
keeper of the rules, but I didn't realize it could
monitor us so closely.
jpnChrName: ……同じように“ルール”の方も 監視されているとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
……同じように“ルール”の方も
監視されているとしたら……

engChrName: Yeah. With that thing following our every move, the bomb could go off the second a rule is broken.
engSearchText:
Yeah. With that thing following our every move, the
bomb could go off the second a rule is broken.
jpnChrName: 破った瞬間、反応兵器が 起爆するって仕組みってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
破った瞬間、反応兵器が
起爆するって仕組みってわけか。

engChrName: Hey, don't get all doom and gloom on me, you guys. As long as we play by the book, we'll be fine.
engSearchText:
Hey, don't get all doom and gloom on me, you guys.
As long as we play by the book, we'll be fine.
jpnChrName: 止めればいいじゃない、何としても。
jpnSearchText: 止めればいいじゃない、何としても。

engChrName: Though I bet we can find a few loopholes here and there, too. Don't forget, our boss man's a loophole-finding master.
engSearchText:
Though I bet we can find a few loopholes here and
there, too. Don't forget, our boss man's a
loophole-finding master.
jpnChrName: それに、どうせこっちの所長が “抜け道”を考えてくれるでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
それに、どうせこっちの所長が
“抜け道”を考えてくれるでしょ。

engChrName: Good point.
engSearchText: Good point.

engChrName: Hey, that feels more like a diss than a compliment... Still, you're not wrong. And I'm idea-generatin' as we speak.
engSearchText:
Hey, that feels more like a diss than a compliment...
Still, you're not wrong. And I'm idea-generatin' as
we speak.
jpnChrName: 別に裏技専門でもねぇが…… ま、どこかしら“穴”はあんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
別に裏技専門でもねぇが……
ま、どこかしら“穴”はあんだろ。

engChrName: Can't rack my brain over it too much, though. If we sit on our asses, we'll be havin' a date with the Goddess tonight.
engSearchText:
Can't rack my brain over it too much, though. If we
sit on our asses, we'll be havin' a date with the
Goddess tonight.
jpnChrName: ──どのみち、手をこまねいてたら 明後日の深夜０時に全員仲良く女神行きだ。
jpnSearchText:
──どのみち、手をこまねいてたら
明後日の深夜０時に全員仲良く女神行きだ。

engChrName: I'll come up with something, though. We'll find a way to outwit 'em.
engSearchText:
I'll come up with something, though. We'll find a way
to outwit 'em.
jpnChrName: せいぜい俺たちらしく足掻いて 連中の裏を掻いてやろうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい俺たちらしく足掻いて
連中の裏を掻いてやろうぜ。

engChrName: Yeah. I'm sure we will.
engSearchText: Yeah. I'm sure we will.
jpnChrName: ……うん、そうだね。
jpnSearchText: ……うん、そうだね。

engChrName: Either way, we've got the card now, but we can't use it just yet.
engSearchText:
Either way, we've got the card now, but we can't use
it just yet.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーは手に入ったけど、 使えるのは開始時刻になってからだ。
jpnSearchText:
アクセスキーは手に入ったけど、
使えるのは開始時刻になってからだ。

engChrName: We may as well head back above ground for now.
engSearchText: We may as well head back above ground for now.
jpnChrName: 一旦街に戻ろうか。
jpnSearchText: 一旦街に戻ろうか。

engChrName: Hey there, guys.
engSearchText: Hey there, guys.
jpnChrName: よう、お前さんたちか。
jpnSearchText: よう、お前さんたちか。

engChrName: Nice to see you all again.
engSearchText: Nice to see you all again.
jpnChrName: また会ったね。
jpnSearchText: また会ったね。

engChrName: We apologize for imposing on you like this.
engSearchText: We apologize for imposing on you like this.
jpnChrName: えっと…… 突然お邪魔してすみません。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……
突然お邪魔してすみません。

engChrName: Oh, not at all. Renne already informed us that you would be coming.
engSearchText:
Oh, not at all. Renne already informed us that you
would be coming.
jpnChrName: レンさんから連絡はきているわ。 何か話があるそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
レンさんから連絡はきているわ。
何か話があるそうだけど……

engChrName: The game will begin soon, so we may need to keep this brief. What is it you wanted to discuss?
engSearchText:
The game will begin soon, so we may need to keep
this brief. What is it you wanted to discuss?
jpnChrName: そろそろゲームが始まるこの状況で、 一体どんな話なのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
そろそろゲームが始まるこの状況で、
一体どんな話なのかしら？

engChrName: Actually, we wanted to propose somethin'.
engSearchText: Actually, we wanted to propose somethin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、お前らに提案がある。
jpnSearchText: ああ、お前らに提案がある。

engChrName: You guys wanna form an alliance for this thing?
engSearchText: You guys wanna form an alliance for this thing?
jpnChrName: この“ゲーム”── 俺たちと組まねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
この“ゲーム”──
俺たちと組まねぇか？

engChrName: Oh. Now there's an interesting idea.
engSearchText: Oh. Now there's an interesting idea.
jpnChrName: 私たち（ギルド）が、貴方たち（裏解決屋）と……？
jpnSearchText: 私たち（ギルド）が、貴方たち（裏解決屋）と……？

engChrName: I guess there's no rule that says you can't. You guys sure are pros at thinking outside the box.
engSearchText:
I guess there's no rule that says you can't. You guys
sure are pros at thinking outside the box.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、しがらみのない 裏解決屋だから使える“裏ワザ”か。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど、しがらみのない
裏解決屋だから使える“裏ワザ”か。

engChrName: Well, it's tempting—we ARE kinda short on numbers.
engSearchText: Well, it's tempting—we ARE kinda short on numbers.
jpnChrName: こっちも人手不足の状況だし、 確かにアリかもしれないけど……
jpnSearchText:
こっちも人手不足の状況だし、
確かにアリかもしれないけど……

engChrName: Oh, and please don't misunderstand. We aren't trying to capitalize on that fact...
engSearchText:
Oh, and please don't misunderstand. We aren't trying
to capitalize on that fact...
jpnChrName: その……決してそこに 付け込むつもりじゃありません。
jpnSearchText:
その……決してそこに
付け込むつもりじゃありません。

engChrName: ...but we have our reasons for wanting to make it to the end. We need to be the last team standing.
engSearchText:
...but we have our reasons for wanting to make it to
the end. We need to be the last team standing.
jpnChrName: ですが私たちも何としても“最後”に 辿り着きたい理由がある──
jpnSearchText:
ですが私たちも何としても“最後”に
辿り着きたい理由がある──

engChrName: So, how about it? Will you help us?
engSearchText: So, how about it? Will you help us?
jpnChrName: どうか力を貸して頂きたいんです。
jpnSearchText: どうか力を貸して頂きたいんです。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: I think it's pretty clear that our interests are aligned.
engSearchText: I think it's pretty clear that our interests are aligned.
jpnChrName: ……アルマータはやり過ぎた。 遊撃士として見過ごせないのは同じ。
jpnSearchText:
……アルマータはやり過ぎた。
遊撃士として見過ごせないのは同じ。

engChrName: And if we teamed up, I'm sure we'd be a force to be reckoned with. There's one problem, though.
engSearchText:
And if we teamed up, I'm sure we'd be a force to be
reckoned with. There's one problem, though.
jpnChrName: そっちの実力も分かってるし、 戦力増強は願ってもないけど──
jpnSearchText:
そっちの実力も分かってるし、
戦力増強は願ってもないけど──

engChrName: And that problem is...we disagree on a few key fundamental issues.
engSearchText:
And that problem is...we disagree on a few key
fundamental issues.
jpnChrName: ──当然、分かった上で言ってるのよね？ お互いの“流儀”が違っているのは。
jpnSearchText:
──当然、分かった上で言ってるのよね？
お互いの“流儀”が違っているのは。

engChrName: For good or for ill, we must follow the bracer code to the letter.
engSearchText:
For good or for ill, we must follow the bracer code to
the letter.
jpnChrName: 私たちは良くも悪くも、 “規約”に則（のっと）って動いている──
jpnSearchText:
私たちは良くも悪くも、
“規約”に則（のっと）って動いている──

engChrName: So if we join forces, you will have to adhere to it as well. No compromises.
engSearchText:
So if we join forces, you will have to adhere to it
as well. No compromises.
jpnChrName: それが貴方たちの行動を制限する 可能性はゼロじゃないはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
それが貴方たちの行動を制限する
可能性はゼロじゃないはずよ。

engChrName: No surprises there.
engSearchText: No surprises there.
jpnChrName: まあ、そうだろうな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そうだろうな。

engChrName: But we desperately need your—no, all of your help— if we're gonna win this.
engSearchText:
But we desperately need your—no, all of your help—
if we're gonna win this.
jpnChrName: それでもお前の──アンタらの力が必要だ。 俺たちが勝ち残るためには。
jpnSearchText:
それでもお前の──アンタらの力が必要だ。
俺たちが勝ち残るためには。

engChrName: We've already had a lotta run-ins with Almata—more than I'd like to admit, actually...
engSearchText:
We've already had a lotta run-ins with Almata—more
than I'd like to admit, actually...
jpnChrName: 何の因果か、俺たちはアルマータの連中と これまで何度もカチ合ってきた。
jpnSearchText:
何の因果か、俺たちはアルマータの連中と
これまで何度もカチ合ってきた。

engChrName: ...but that also means we know some juicy details about 'em. Want me to spill the beans?
engSearchText:
...but that also means we know some juicy details
about 'em. Want me to spill the beans?
jpnChrName: 戦闘におけるアドバンテージは勿論、 色々と情報提供もできる。
jpnSearchText:
戦闘におけるアドバンテージは勿論、
色々と情報提供もできる。

engChrName: Then all you gotta do is join up with us. Sounds like a pretty sweet deal, doesn't it?
engSearchText:
Then all you gotta do is join up with us. Sounds like a
pretty sweet deal, doesn't it?
jpnChrName: 悪くない話だと思わねぇか？
jpnSearchText: 悪くない話だと思わねぇか？

engChrName: (Gotta hand it to him. The guy knows how to sell an idea—and he's relentless, too.)
engSearchText:
(Gotta hand it to him. The guy knows how to sell an
idea—and he's relentless, too.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、切り込むじゃねぇか。）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、切り込むじゃねぇか。）

engChrName: (Unfortunately, they are a tough customer.)
engSearchText: (Unfortunately, they are a tough customer.)
jpnChrName: （ですが……）
jpnSearchText: （ですが……）

engChrName: Well, you aren't wrong. We don't have a particularly good reason to turn down your offer...
engSearchText:
Well, you aren't wrong. We don't have a particularly
good reason to turn down your offer...
jpnChrName: ……確かに断る理由はないかもしれない。
jpnSearchText: ……確かに断る理由はないかもしれない。

engChrName: ...save for one: you are keeping secrets from us. Trust is the foundation of effective teamwork—and you clearly do not trust us.
engSearchText:
...save for one: you are keeping secrets from us.
Trust is the foundation of effective teamwork—and
you clearly do not trust us.
jpnChrName: だけど、“隠し事”をしたまま 押し通そうとしているのは気になるわね？
jpnSearchText:
だけど、“隠し事”をしたまま
押し通そうとしているのは気になるわね？

engChrName: To quote one of your favorite phrases, 'Your request just ain't up to our standards.'
engSearchText:
To quote one of your favorite phrases, 'Your request
just ain't up to our standards.'
jpnChrName: ギルドへの依頼として、貴方たち風に言えば “筋が通らない”んじゃないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ギルドへの依頼として、貴方たち風に言えば
“筋が通らない”んじゃないかしら？

engChrName: (Negotiations are breaking down fast. Should we...?)
engSearchText: (Negotiations are breaking down fast. Should we...?)
jpnChrName: っ…… （ヴァンさん、いざとなれば……）
jpnSearchText:
っ……
（ヴァンさん、いざとなれば……）

engChrName: (No. The Geneses are a secret we should keep close to the chest.)
engSearchText:
(No. The Geneses are a secret we should keep close
to the chest.)
jpnChrName: （……ゲネシスのことは   ギリギリまで伏せておけ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ゲネシスのことは
ギリギリまで伏せておけ。）

engChrName: (The guild has close ties to the foundation. That's why even Renne hasn't brought it up to them.)
engSearchText:
(The guild has close ties to the foundation.
That's why even Renne hasn't brought it up to them.)
jpnChrName: （ギルドは財団とも繋がりが深い。   レンも黙ってくれてるみたいだからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ギルドは財団とも繋がりが深い。
レンも黙ってくれてるみたいだからな。）

engChrName: Well, I'm sure you have your reasons for keeping us in the dark, so I'm not gonna press you too hard on it.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm sure you have your reasons for keeping us in
the dark, so I'm not gonna press you too hard on it.
jpnChrName: フフ、何やら事情がありそうだ。 この状況だし無理に話せとは言わんさ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、何やら事情がありそうだ。
この状況だし無理に話せとは言わんさ。

engChrName: But if we're gonna make this work, there's one concession you'll have to make.
engSearchText:
But if we're gonna make this work, there's one
concession you'll have to make.
jpnChrName: ──だが当然、 それなりの筋は通してもらう必要がある。
jpnSearchText:
──だが当然、
それなりの筋は通してもらう必要がある。

engChrName: You can't bring those two civilians into the game.
engSearchText: You can't bring those two civilians into the game.
jpnChrName: たとえばそっちの嬢ちゃんと坊主という “民間人”を連れて行こうとしてるとかな。
jpnSearchText:
たとえばそっちの嬢ちゃんと坊主という
“民間人”を連れて行こうとしてるとかな。

engChrName: A-Ah, right. The code.
engSearchText: A-Ah, right. The code.
jpnChrName: ……そ、そういえばギルドって……
jpnSearchText: ……そ、そういえばギルドって……

engChrName: We'll turn a blind eye to the trainee warrior, the guy with Heiyue connections, and the Marduk concierge.
engSearchText:
We'll turn a blind eye to the trainee warrior, the guy
with Heiyue connections, and the Marduk concierge.
jpnChrName: 戦士見習いに、黒月と縁がある若いの、 ＭＫ社のＳＣさんはまあいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
戦士見習いに、黒月と縁がある若いの、
ＭＫ社のＳＣさんはまあいいだろう。

engChrName: As for that actress... Actually, maybe some stones are better left unturned.
engSearchText:
As for that actress... Actually, maybe some stones are
better left unturned.
jpnChrName: そっちの女優さんは…… ま、深くツッコむのは野暮だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
そっちの女優さんは……
ま、深くツッコむのは野暮だろうが。

engChrName: If you insist on taking those two students, though, the deal's off.
engSearchText:
If you insist on taking those two students, though, the
deal's off.
jpnChrName: だがそっちの嬢ちゃんは只の学生だし ハミルトン一門の坊主も同様だろう。
jpnSearchText:
だがそっちの嬢ちゃんは只の学生だし
ハミルトン一門の坊主も同様だろう。

engChrName: We're about to throw ourselves into the fire—and I'm not about to drag them into it with us.
engSearchText:
We're about to throw ourselves into the fire—and I'm
not about to drag them into it with us.
jpnChrName: 死地に連れていくのは、ギルドとしちゃ 見過ごすわけにもいかなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
死地に連れていくのは、ギルドとしちゃ
見過ごすわけにもいかなくてね。

engChrName: You've gotta be kidding me.
engSearchText: You've gotta be kidding me.
jpnChrName: チッ……置いてくのはいいが 今更すぎんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……置いてくのはいいが
今更すぎんだろうが。

engChrName: That's dumb! We're not going to leave anyone behind! Right, Van?
engSearchText:
That's dumb! We're not going to leave
anyone behind! Right, Van?
jpnChrName: だ、駄目ですっ……！
jpnSearchText: だ、駄目ですっ……！

engChrName: I'd rather not, but I'm not gonna force my opinion down their throats. It ain't my job to convince them.
engSearchText:
I'd rather not, but I'm not gonna force my opinion
down their throats. It ain't my job to convince them.
jpnChrName: ……ま、お説ごもっともだ。 だがウチは本人の希望重視でね。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、お説ごもっともだ。
だがウチは本人の希望重視でね。

engChrName: I have a personal stake in this matter. The nuclear weapon has more to do with me than anyone else.
engSearchText:
I have a personal stake in this matter. The nuclear
weapon has more to do with me than anyone else.
jpnChrName: ……反応兵器だけで言うんだったら 多分、この地で僕が一番の当事者だ。
jpnSearchText:
……反応兵器だけで言うんだったら
多分、この地で僕が一番の当事者だ。

engChrName: I am not about to let it be abused. So I won't stand aside—because I know I have the strength to do something about it.
engSearchText:
I am not about to let it be abused. So I won't stand
aside—because I know I have the strength to do
something about it.
jpnChrName: 絶対に見過ごせないし── そのための“力”ならあるつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
絶対に見過ごせないし──
そのための“力”ならあるつもりです。

engChrName: I, too, have held my own during many crises with everyone here.
engSearchText:
I, too, have held my own during many crises with
everyone here.
jpnChrName: 私も……これまでヴァンさんたちと 幾つもの危機を何とか乗り越えてきました。
jpnSearchText:
私も……これまでヴァンさんたちと
幾つもの危機を何とか乗り越えてきました。

engChrName: I am capable of making an objective self-assessment of my strengths and weaknesses—and what I can and cannot do. I know I can do this.
engSearchText:
I am capable of making an objective self-assessment
of my strengths and weaknesses—and what I can and
cannot do. I know I can do this.
jpnChrName: 自分ができること、出来ないことの区別も ある程度できるようになったつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
自分ができること、出来ないことの区別も
ある程度できるようになったつもりです。

engChrName: While I can't share all the details now, I have a strong connection to the truth of what's happening here.
engSearchText:
While I can't share all the details now, I have a strong
connection to the truth of what's happening here.
jpnChrName: そして詳しくは話せませんが── 事件の“鍵”の一端に関わっています。
jpnSearchText:
そして詳しくは話せませんが──
事件の“鍵”の一端に関わっています。

engChrName: Huh.
engSearchText: Huh.
jpnChrName: ……そっか。
jpnSearchText: ……そっか。

engChrName: All right. You've got the resolve, at least.
engSearchText: All right. You've got the resolve, at least.
jpnChrName: 意気やよしだ── だったら示してもらおうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
意気やよしだ──
だったら示してもらおうじゃないか。

engChrName: So now's the part where you put your fist where your mouth is.
engSearchText:
So now's the part where you put your fist where your
mouth is.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋の実力も含めた上で、 俺たちが協力するに相応しい相手かをな！
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋の実力も含めた上で、
俺たちが協力するに相応しい相手かをな！

engChrName: Really? We're fighting NOW? Of all times?!
engSearchText: Really? We're fighting NOW? Of all times?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっとちょっと！？ いきなりすぎない？！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっとちょっと！？
いきなりすぎない？！

engChrName: I fear this is a necessary measure if we are to convince them.
engSearchText:
I fear this is a necessary measure if we are to
convince them.
jpnChrName: ですが必要な試しかと……！
jpnSearchText: ですが必要な試しかと……！

engChrName: If this is a test of the mettle of our youth, then I will stay out of this.
engSearchText:
If this is a test of the mettle of our youth, then I will
stay out of this.
jpnChrName: 若人たちが気概を見せる時── 老骨はいったん下がるとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
若人たちが気概を見せる時──
老骨はいったん下がるとしようか。

engChrName: Ha. Many thanks, friend.
engSearchText: Ha. Many thanks, friend.
jpnChrName: ハハ、心遣い痛み入る。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、心遣い痛み入る。

engChrName: Zin...
engSearchText: Zin...
jpnChrName: ジンさん……
jpnSearchText: ジンさん……

engChrName: We'll be rooting for you.
engSearchText: We'll be rooting for you.
jpnChrName: ま、見届けようか。
jpnSearchText: ま、見届けようか。

engChrName: We're up against a future S-rank bracer. Don't drop your guard for a second!
engSearchText:
We're up against a future S-rank bracer. Don't drop
your guard for a second!
jpnChrName: 相手は準Ｓ級だ── 一気に持ってかれねぇよう食らいつけ！
jpnSearchText:
相手は準Ｓ級だ──
一気に持ってかれねぇよう食らいつけ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: FIO, XEROS! With me!
engSearchText: FIO, XEROS! With me!
jpnChrName: 行くよ、ＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ！
jpnSearchText: 行くよ、ＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ！

engChrName: Understood! / RUFF!
engSearchText: Understood! / RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＯＫ、カトル！／ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: ＯＫ、カトル！／ＢＯＷ！！

engChrName: And I, Zin the Immovable, of the Taito school, will serve as your opponent.
engSearchText:
And I, Zin the Immovable, of the Taito school,
will serve as your opponent.
jpnChrName: 泰斗流《不動》 ジン・ヴァセック──参る！！
jpnSearchText:
泰斗流《不動》
ジン・ヴァセック──参る！！

engChrName: The match is decided.
engSearchText: The match is decided.
jpnChrName: ──そこまで！
jpnSearchText: ──そこまで！

engChrName: *pant* Does that mean...
engSearchText: *pant* Does that mean...
jpnChrName: はあはあ…… ……も、もしかして……
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ……
……も、もしかして……

engChrName: We...did it...?
engSearchText: We...did it...?
jpnChrName: 私たち……何とか……？
jpnSearchText: 私たち……何とか……？

engChrName: Well, I'll be. You got me. I might be getting a little too old for this stuff.
engSearchText:
Well, I'll be. You got me. I might be getting a little
too old for this stuff.
jpnChrName: いや～、負けちまったな。 俺もいい加減トシかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、負けちまったな。
俺もいい加減トシかねぇ。

engChrName: Says the guy who isn't even out of breath.
engSearchText: Says the guy who isn't even out of breath.
jpnChrName: ったく……そんな 余裕そうにしてよく言うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……そんな
余裕そうにしてよく言うぜ。

engChrName: You're a freak of nature, you know that? I guess the Taito style is the real deal.
engSearchText:
You're a freak of nature, you know that? I guess the
Taito style is the real deal.
jpnChrName: ……チッ…… これが“泰斗流”かよ……
jpnSearchText:
……チッ……
これが“泰斗流”かよ……

engChrName: He stood as firm as a mountain in the wake of our attacks. No wonder he is called the Immovable.
engSearchText:
He stood as firm as a mountain in the wake of
our attacks. No wonder he is called the Immovable.
jpnChrName: 泰山のごとき揺るぎなさ…… ……まさしく《不動》ですか。
jpnSearchText:
泰山のごとき揺るぎなさ……
……まさしく《不動》ですか。

engChrName: So if we beat you, then does that mean...
engSearchText: So if we beat you, then does that mean...
jpnChrName: で、でもこれで……！？
jpnSearchText: で、でもこれで……！？

engChrName: Yeah. I'm fully convinced you've all got the will and the strength to see this through. Even you two.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I'm fully convinced you've all got the will and
the strength to see this through. Even you two.
jpnChrName: ──ああ、嬢ちゃんと坊主にも 意志と実力は十分にあるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
──ああ、嬢ちゃんと坊主にも
意志と実力は十分にあるようだ。

engChrName: I can't dismiss you as helpless civilians now. I won't object to you tagging along.
engSearchText:
I can't dismiss you as helpless civilians now. I won't
object to you tagging along.
jpnChrName: 単なる民間人って括りで 遠ざけられないくらいのな。
jpnSearchText:
単なる民間人って括りで
遠ざけられないくらいのな。

engChrName: Thank you, sir.
engSearchText: Thank you, sir.
jpnChrName: ……ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ……ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Admittedly, I would not be able to keep pace without the aid of FIO and XEROS.
engSearchText:
Admittedly, I would not be able to keep pace without
the aid of FIO and XEROS.
jpnChrName: ま、僕はＦＩＯと ＸＥＲＯＳ込みだけどね……
jpnSearchText:
ま、僕はＦＩＯと
ＸＥＲＯＳ込みだけどね……

engChrName: Eh. I draw my strength from my gunswords, and you draw your strength from them. It's all relative.
engSearchText:
Eh. I draw my strength from my gunswords, and you
draw your strength from them. It's all relative.
jpnChrName: それを含めての実力。 胸を張っていいと思う。
jpnSearchText:
それを含めての実力。
胸を張っていいと思う。

engChrName: I will give credit where it's due. You all have grown much stronger since we first met.
engSearchText:
I will give credit where it's due. You all have grown
much stronger since we first met.
jpnChrName: ふう、確かに最初の頃より 足腰もしっかりしているし……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、確かに最初の頃より
足腰もしっかりしているし……

engChrName: I'm still reluctant to accept your participation in this, but seeing as how my companions have come around to the idea, I will concede.
engSearchText:
I'm still reluctant to accept your participation in this,
but seeing as how my companions have come around
to the idea, I will concede.
jpnChrName: ……ちょっと複雑だけど これは認めざるを得ないわね。
jpnSearchText:
……ちょっと複雑だけど
これは認めざるを得ないわね。

engChrName: Guess that settles it. We'll happily work with you guys.
engSearchText:
Guess that settles it. We'll happily work with
you guys.
jpnChrName: ──お前さんたち裏解決屋との協力、 喜んで受けさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──お前さんたち裏解決屋との協力、
喜んで受けさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: So long as our shared goal's to stop Almata—and ideally take 'em in alive—this doesn't violate the bracer code.
engSearchText:
So long as our shared goal's to stop Almata—and
ideally take 'em in alive—this doesn't violate the
bracer code.
jpnChrName: アルマータの企みを止め、可能なら拘束する── 俺たちの規約ともバッティングはしないしな。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの企みを止め、可能なら拘束する──
俺たちの規約ともバッティングはしないしな。

engChrName: But we're still gonna follow the code to the letter. Can't waver on that point no matter what. Deal?
engSearchText:
But we're still gonna follow the code to the letter.
Can't waver on that point no matter what. Deal?
jpnChrName: 支える籠手の一線も譲るつもりはない── カチ合うことがあれば是々非々と行こうか？
jpnSearchText:
支える籠手の一線も譲るつもりはない──
カチ合うことがあれば是々非々と行こうか？

engChrName: Yeah, it's a deal.
engSearchText: Yeah, it's a deal.
jpnChrName: ──取引成立だ、不動。
jpnSearchText: ──取引成立だ、不動。

engChrName: We'll be countin' on you guys.
engSearchText: We'll be countin' on you guys.
jpnChrName: エレインにクラウゼルも この３日間よろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
エレインにクラウゼルも
この３日間よろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Ha. Same here!
engSearchText: Ha. Same here!
jpnChrName: ハハ、こっちこそだ！
jpnSearchText: ハハ、こっちこそだ！

engChrName: ...Why the long face? You're not happy about this arrangement? That's surprising.
engSearchText:
...Why the long face? You're not happy about
this arrangement? That's surprising.
jpnChrName: ？　……どしたの？ 願ってもないんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
？　……どしたの？
願ってもないんじゃない？

engChrName: On the contrary, I'm quite pleased. They will no doubt prove to be a valuable asset to us.
engSearchText:
On the contrary, I'm quite pleased. They will no
doubt prove to be a valuable asset to us.
jpnChrName: そうね……腐れ縁抜きでも 実力的には申し分はないし。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……腐れ縁抜きでも
実力的には申し分はないし。

engChrName: (Although, this does throw a wrench into my plans... Actually, maybe not.)
engSearchText:
(Although, this does throw a wrench into my plans...
Actually, maybe not.)
jpnChrName: （……ただ、少し動きづらくなった……   ううん、逆に動きやすくなったかしら？）
jpnSearchText:
（……ただ、少し動きづらくなった……
ううん、逆に動きやすくなったかしら？）

engChrName: Zin, Elaine, and Fie will join you in the underground labyrinth expeditions. (They will not accompany you around town.)
engSearchText:
Zin, Elaine, and Fie will join you in the underground
labyrinth expeditions.
(They will not accompany you around town.)
jpnChrName: ジン、エレイン、フィーが 地下の攻略時に同行するようになった。 ※街での活動には参加しません。
jpnSearchText:
ジン、エレイン、フィーが
地下の攻略時に同行するようになった。
※街での活動には参加しません。

engChrName: Oho. Now, who do we have here?
engSearchText: Oho. Now, who do we have here?
jpnChrName: おやおや、これは意外な客人ですね。
jpnSearchText: おやおや、これは意外な客人ですね。

engChrName: Huh. Didn't realize you were gonna be here, Yin.
engSearchText: Huh. Didn't realize you were gonna be here, Yin.
jpnChrName: ツァオ──それに《銀（イン）》。 アンタも来ているのは聞いてたが。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオ──それに《銀（イン）》。
アンタも来ているのは聞いてたが。

engChrName: We meet again—albeit in more dire circumstances this time.
engSearchText:
We meet again—albeit in more dire circumstances
this time.
jpnChrName: ……お疲れ様です、裏解決屋の方々。 ラングポート以来ですね。
jpnSearchText:
……お疲れ様です、裏解決屋の方々。
ラングポート以来ですね。

engChrName: (...It's her.)
engSearchText: (...It's her.)
jpnChrName: （……なるほど、そうだったのね。）
jpnSearchText: （……なるほど、そうだったのね。）

engChrName: ...? Well, color me surprised. Didn't think you had the balls to come down here yourself, Cao.
engSearchText:
...? Well, color me surprised. Didn't think you had
the balls to come down here yourself, Cao.
jpnChrName: ……？　しかしまさかツァオ、 アンタが直接出張ってくるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
……？　しかしまさかツァオ、
アンタが直接出張ってくるとはな。

engChrName: I thought you were the type to watch the chaos from afar while sipping tea and scheming shit. You're gonna get those feeble hands all dirty.
engSearchText:
I thought you were the type to watch the chaos from
afar while sipping tea and scheming shit.
You're gonna get those feeble hands all dirty.
jpnChrName: こういうのは下っ端に任せて 策を巡らせるのが流儀だと思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
こういうのは下っ端に任せて
策を巡らせるのが流儀だと思ったが。

engChrName: I am surprised to see so few among your rank.
engSearchText: I am surprised to see so few among your rank.
jpnChrName: ……しかも報告にあった数より 遙かに手勢が少ないようですね。
jpnSearchText:
……しかも報告にあった数より
遙かに手勢が少ないようですね。

engChrName: I left the rest of my men behind. They've been placed on alert, and I tasked them with serving as liaisons.
engSearchText:
I left the rest of my men behind. They've been placed
on alert, and I tasked them with serving as liaisons.
jpnChrName: フフ、他の者たちは地上の 警戒と連絡役に残してきました。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、他の者たちは地上の
警戒と連絡役に残してきました。

engChrName: Not to mention, they would have certainly held Yin back.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, they would have certainly held
Yin back.
jpnChrName: 《銀》殿に合わせられるのも 限られますし、妥当な役割分担でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
《銀》殿に合わせられるのも
限られますし、妥当な役割分担でしょう。

engChrName: Well, I'm not about to question your methods. You probably got an ace or ten up your sleeve, anyway.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm not about to question your methods.
You probably got an ace or ten up your
sleeve, anyway.
jpnChrName: ハン……まあアンタのことだ。 色々仕込んでるのは間違いなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……まあアンタのことだ。
色々仕込んでるのは間違いなさそうだが。

engChrName: We're pressed for time, so I'll cut to the chase—
engSearchText: We're pressed for time, so I'll cut to the chase—
jpnChrName: 時間もねえから単刀直入に行く──
jpnSearchText: 時間もねえから単刀直入に行く──

engChrName: I presume you are here to request our assistance?
engSearchText: I presume you are here to request our assistance?
jpnChrName: 私共の力を借りたい、とのご相談ですか？
jpnSearchText: 私共の力を借りたい、とのご相談ですか？

engChrName: I will take that reaction as a yes.
engSearchText: I will take that reaction as a yes.
jpnChrName: フフ、このタイミングで訪ねてくる 理由はそれくらいだろうと思いまして。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、このタイミングで訪ねてくる
理由はそれくらいだろうと思いまして。

engChrName: I cannot think of any other reason why you would seek us out—not after taking the game's rules into account.
engSearchText:
I cannot think of any other reason why you would
seek us out—not after taking the game's rules
into account.
jpnChrName: あのゲームのルールを鑑みると、ね。
jpnSearchText: あのゲームのルールを鑑みると、ね。

engChrName: You spotted the loophole, too?
engSearchText: You spotted the loophole, too?
jpnChrName: とっくに“穴”を見抜いて……
jpnSearchText: とっくに“穴”を見抜いて……

engChrName: Your mind is as sharp as they say. Your reputation precedes you, White Orchid Dragon.
engSearchText:
Your mind is as sharp as they say. Your reputation
precedes you, White Orchid Dragon.
jpnChrName: なるほど《白蘭竜》の異名、 予てより聞いてはいたが。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど《白蘭竜》の異名、
予てより聞いてはいたが。

engChrName: Still, you're a little off the mark. We ain't here to grovel at your feet and beg for help—we wanna form an equal partnership.
engSearchText:
Still, you're a little off the mark. We ain't here to
grovel at your feet and beg for help—we wanna form
an equal partnership.
jpnChrName: ──だが正確じゃねえな。 頼みたいのはあくまで対等な協力関係だ。
jpnSearchText:
──だが正確じゃねえな。
頼みたいのはあくまで対等な協力関係だ。

engChrName: We've already had a lotta run-ins with Almata—more than I'd like to admit, actually...
engSearchText:
We've already had a lotta run-ins with Almata—more
than I'd like to admit, actually...
jpnChrName: 俺たちはアルマータの幹部連中と これまで何度もカチ合ってきた。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちはアルマータの幹部連中と
これまで何度もカチ合ってきた。

engChrName: ...but that also means we know some juicy details about 'em. Want me to spill the beans?
engSearchText:
...but that also means we know some juicy details
about 'em. Want me to spill the beans?
jpnChrName: 戦闘におけるアドバンテージは勿論、 色々と情報提供もできる。
jpnSearchText:
戦闘におけるアドバンテージは勿論、
色々と情報提供もできる。

engChrName: Then let's form an alliance. Not a bad deal, eh?
engSearchText: Then let's form an alliance. Not a bad deal, eh?
jpnChrName: その“価値”が 分からないアンタじゃねぇだろ？
jpnSearchText:
その“価値”が
分からないアンタじゃねぇだろ？

engChrName: Hmm... Very interesting.
engSearchText: Hmm... Very interesting.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど。

engChrName: We aren't here to stand in your way.
engSearchText: We aren't here to stand in your way.
jpnChrName: その、そちらの目的を 邪魔するつもりはありません。
jpnSearchText:
その、そちらの目的を
邪魔するつもりはありません。

engChrName: We understand it simply isn't our place to interfere with the power balance in the criminal underworld.
engSearchText:
We understand it simply isn't our place to interfere
with the power balance in the criminal underworld.
jpnChrName: ……裏社会の勢力図は私たちが どうこう言えるものでもないでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
……裏社会の勢力図は私たちが
どうこう言えるものでもないでしょうし。

engChrName: Still, I believe this will be a mutually beneficial arrangement for all of us.
engSearchText:
Still, I believe this will be a mutually beneficial
arrangement for all of us.
jpnChrName: ですが、お互いの流儀に 折り合いを付けられる範囲内であれば──
jpnSearchText:
ですが、お互いの流儀に
折り合いを付けられる範囲内であれば──

engChrName: I implore you—lend us your strength so we may bring this monstrous game to an end.
engSearchText:
I implore you—lend us your strength so we may bring
this monstrous game to an end.
jpnChrName: この理不尽で非道なゲームを制するためにも どうか力を貸して頂きたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
この理不尽で非道なゲームを制するためにも
どうか力を貸して頂きたいんです。

engChrName: Heh. I believe I understand your position now. Strength in numbers, as they say.
engSearchText:
Heh. I believe I understand your position now.
Strength in numbers, as they say.
jpnChrName: …………フフ、理解しました。 戦力を盤石にしたいのはこちらも同じです。
jpnSearchText:
…………フフ、理解しました。
戦力を盤石にしたいのはこちらも同じです。

engChrName: Even so, I am going to need further convincing before we decide to take you up on your offer.
engSearchText:
Even so, I am going to need further convincing
before we decide to take you up on your offer.
jpnChrName: ですが──まだいささか 決定的な根拠に欠けているようですね？
jpnSearchText:
ですが──まだいささか
決定的な根拠に欠けているようですね？

engChrName: What more convincing do you need?
engSearchText: What more convincing do you need?
jpnChrName: こ、根拠……？
jpnSearchText: こ、根拠……？

engChrName: We must assess whether your aid will be a boon or a hindrance, so I believe a little combat test is in order.
engSearchText:
We must assess whether your aid will be a boon or a
hindrance, so I believe a little combat test is in order.
jpnChrName: 貴方がたの“純粋な戦力”が どれほどのものかということです。
jpnSearchText:
貴方がたの“純粋な戦力”が
どれほどのものかということです。

engChrName: Would you not agree, Yin?
engSearchText: Would you not agree, Yin?
jpnChrName: ねえ──《銀》殿？
jpnSearchText: ねえ──《銀》殿？

engChrName: I would. I don't consider myself a part of Heiyue, but I am well accustomed to fighting alongside them.
engSearchText:
I would. I don't consider myself a part of Heiyue, but
I am well accustomed to fighting alongside them.
jpnChrName: ええ……私は《黒月》ではありませんが 彼らとの連携はそれなりに慣れています。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……私は《黒月》ではありませんが
彼らとの連携はそれなりに慣れています。

engChrName: Bringing you into the fold could disrupt that synergy...
engSearchText:
Bringing you into the fold could disrupt
that synergy...
jpnChrName: その利を捨てて貴方がたとの連携を 優先する“価値”がどこまであるのか──
jpnSearchText:
その利を捨てて貴方がたとの連携を
優先する“価値”がどこまであるのか──

engChrName: ...so I need reassurance that your strength will make up for that.
engSearchText:
...so I need reassurance that your strength will make
up for that.
jpnChrName: 乗り越えられる実力と意志があるかは、 確かめておく必要があるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
乗り越えられる実力と意志があるかは、
確かめておく必要があるでしょう。

engChrName: Well, if that's how it's gotta be, that's how it's gotta be.
engSearchText:
Well, if that's how it's gotta be, that's how it's
gotta be.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そういう流れかよ……！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そういう流れかよ……！

engChrName: So we will be facing the legendary xiongshou, then.
engSearchText: So we will be facing the legendary xiongshou, then.
jpnChrName: 伝説の凶手《銀》──数年前より 代替わりはされているようですが。
jpnSearchText:
伝説の凶手《銀》──数年前より
代替わりはされているようですが。

engChrName: Excellent. I could hardly think of a more worthy opponent.
engSearchText:
Excellent. I could hardly think of a more
worthy opponent.
jpnChrName: 数多の動乱で多くを果たした功績…… 実力を測る上で最適の人選であろうな。
jpnSearchText:
数多の動乱で多くを果たした功績……
実力を測る上で最適の人選であろうな。

engChrName: ...I am honored you of all people would say that.
engSearchText: ...I am honored you of all people would say that.
jpnChrName: ……恐縮です。
jpnSearchText: ……恐縮です。

engChrName: Unfortunately, I must request that you serve as referee. It would not be a fair assessment, otherwise.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, I must request that you serve
as referee. It would not be a fair
assessment, otherwise.
jpnChrName: フフ、そちらの“獅子殿”には 立ち会いをお願いして頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、そちらの“獅子殿”には
立ち会いをお願いして頂きましょう。

engChrName: Yin and I shall serve as your opponents. The older gentleman aside, you may all participate in this bat—
engSearchText:
Yin and I shall serve as your opponents. The older
gentleman aside, you may all participate in this bat—
jpnChrName: こちらは私と《銀》殿のみ、 そちらはヴァンさんと残りで──
jpnSearchText:
こちらは私と《銀》殿のみ、
そちらはヴァンさんと残りで──

engChrName: Nah. We don't need that many.
engSearchText: Nah. We don't need that many.
jpnChrName: ──必要ないわ。
jpnSearchText: ──必要ないわ。

engChrName: Ah. It's a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance, Judith Lanster.
engSearchText:
Ah. It's a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance,
Judith Lanster.
jpnChrName: おや……？ ジュディス・ランスターさん。
jpnSearchText:
おや……？
ジュディス・ランスターさん。

engChrName: I'm something of a fan, myself. Golden Blood is undisputedly my movie of the year.
engSearchText:
I'm something of a fan, myself. Golden Blood is
undisputedly my movie of the year.
jpnChrName: 《ゴールデンブラッド》は拝見しました。 いやぁ、私的には今年一番でしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
《ゴールデンブラッド》は拝見しました。
いやぁ、私的には今年一番でしたよ。

engChrName: Uh, thanks. Anyway...
engSearchText: Uh, thanks. Anyway...
jpnChrName: それはどうもありがとう。 ──ま、それはそれとして。
jpnSearchText:
それはどうもありがとう。
──ま、それはそれとして。

engChrName: It's good to see you again. Been a while, hasn't it?
engSearchText: It's good to see you again. Been a while, hasn't it?
jpnChrName: 久しぶりね── まさかこんなことになるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりね──
まさかこんなことになるなんて。

engChrName: That it has. You've been doing quite well for yourself while I've been away.
engSearchText:
That it has. You've been doing quite well for yourself
while I've been away.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、久々の再会、 できれば別の機会にしたかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、久々の再会、
できれば別の機会にしたかったけど。

engChrName: Wait, hold the phone. You two know each other?
engSearchText: Wait, hold the phone. You two know each other?

engChrName: For real? You, like, friends or something?
engSearchText: For real? You, like, friends or something?
jpnChrName: し、知り合いだったのかよ！？
jpnSearchText: し、知り合いだったのかよ！？

engChrName: Yeah. Although, we're not just friends. We're rivals.
engSearchText: Yeah. Although, we're not just friends. We're rivals.
jpnChrName: ええ── といっても“表の世界”じゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──
といっても“表の世界”じゃないわ。

engChrName: And we've been that way since the day we met.
engSearchText: And we've been that way since the day we met.
jpnChrName: あたしと彼女は“裏”方面での デビュー時からのライバルでね。
jpnSearchText:
あたしと彼女は“裏”方面での
デビュー時からのライバルでね。

engChrName: That was...eight years ago now? We had only just taken up the mantle from our predecessors at that point.
engSearchText:
That was...eight years ago now? We had only just
taken up the mantle from our predecessors at
that point.
jpnChrName: ８年前、同じく“先代”から継ぐため、 見習いとして活動してた頃に出会って……
jpnSearchText:
８年前、同じく“先代”から継ぐため、
見習いとして活動してた頃に出会って……

engChrName: Sometimes our jobs put us in conflict with one another, but we got to team up every now and then.
engSearchText:
Sometimes our jobs put us in conflict with one
another, but we got to team up every now and then.
jpnChrName: “立場”の違いはあったけど時に対立し、 時に協力し高め合ってきた──
jpnSearchText:
“立場”の違いはあったけど時に対立し、
時に協力し高め合ってきた──

engChrName: We may have been rivals, but we were comrades, too.
engSearchText: We may have been rivals, but we were comrades, too.
jpnChrName: 同い年のライバルで…… 間違いなく“戦友”だったと思ってる。
jpnSearchText:
同い年のライバルで……
間違いなく“戦友”だったと思ってる。

engChrName: I never would've guessed.
engSearchText: I never would've guessed.
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事情が……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな事情が……

engChrName: The memories are coming back to me. We spent many hours discussing the weight of what we had inherited.
engSearchText:
The memories are coming back to me. We spent
many hours discussing the weight of what we
had inherited.
jpnChrName: ……懐かしいな、お互いの背負っていた ものについても相談し合ったりしたよね。
jpnSearchText:
……懐かしいな、お互いの背負っていた
ものについても相談し合ったりしたよね。

engChrName: Before I knew it, though, you had found your place amongst the stars. You were thriving in a world unbeknownst to me.
engSearchText:
Before I knew it, though, you had found your place
amongst the stars. You were thriving in a world
unbeknownst to me.
jpnChrName: でも貴女は、もう一つの世界で どんどん輝くようになって行って──
jpnSearchText:
でも貴女は、もう一つの世界で
どんどん輝くようになって行って──

engChrName: Oh, but don't misunderstand. I was truly happy for you, but I was a little sad as well. I felt left behind.
engSearchText:
Oh, but don't misunderstand. I was truly happy for
you, but I was a little sad as well. I felt left behind.
jpnChrName: 嬉しく感じると同時に、どこか私だけ 取り残されたような気分にもなったわ。
jpnSearchText:
嬉しく感じると同時に、どこか私だけ
取り残されたような気分にもなったわ。

engChrName: So you left for Crossbell and followed that other path...because of me?!
engSearchText:
So you left for Crossbell and followed that other
path...because of me?!
jpnChrName: だから──だからクロスベルで あんな道を選んだっていうの……！？
jpnSearchText:
だから──だからクロスベルで
あんな道を選んだっていうの……！？

engChrName: Not at all. The path I chose was entirely my own.
engSearchText: Not at all. The path I chose was entirely my own.
jpnChrName: ううん、違うわ。
jpnSearchText: ううん、違うわ。

engChrName: Having said that, it's possible I was subconsciously influenced by you on some level.
engSearchText:
Having said that, it's possible I was subconsciously
influenced by you on some level.
jpnChrName: “あの場所”はそれとは関係ない── でも、どこか貴女に影響されてたのも確か。
jpnSearchText:
“あの場所”はそれとは関係ない──
でも、どこか貴女に影響されてたのも確か。

engChrName: You're like the brightest star in the sky. I'm just a moon—I can't shine like you...or her.
engSearchText:
You're like the brightest star in the sky. I'm just a
moon—I can't shine like you...or her.
jpnChrName: “月”でしかない私が、貴女やあの人みたいに 輝くことは出来ないけど……
jpnSearchText:
“月”でしかない私が、貴女やあの人みたいに
輝くことは出来ないけど……

engChrName: But I came to know the joy of the stage—as well as being at the center of it. The life of theater has captivated me ever since...
engSearchText:
But I came to know the joy of the stage—as well as
being at the center of it. The life of theater has
captivated me ever since...
jpnChrName: たった一つの舞台を高めるという喜びに どうしようもなく取り憑かれてしまっただけ。
jpnSearchText:
たった一つの舞台を高めるという喜びに
どうしようもなく取り憑かれてしまっただけ。

engChrName: ...just like how the life of cinema has done the same for you.
engSearchText:
...just like how the life of cinema has done the same
for you.
jpnChrName: 貴女が映画に賭ける情熱と同じように。
jpnSearchText: 貴女が映画に賭ける情熱と同じように。
……ぁ………

engChrName: Y'know, I'm almost jealous. When I was struggling to find my way, you lent me an ear and your wisdom.
engSearchText:
Y'know, I'm almost jealous. When I was struggling to
find my way, you lent me an ear and your wisdom.
jpnChrName: ……ほんっとズルいわね。 あたしの方は何でも相談してきたのに。
jpnSearchText:
……ほんっとズルいわね。
あたしの方は何でも相談してきたのに。

engChrName: You never needed my help, though. You found the path you wanted to follow all on your own.
engSearchText:
You never needed my help, though. You found the
path you wanted to follow all on your own.
jpnChrName: あんたは昔から、勝手に自分を決めつけて、 勝手に新たな道を選び取って──
jpnSearchText:
あんたは昔から、勝手に自分を決めつけて、
勝手に新たな道を選び取って──

engChrName: Well, well, well! I see my theory proved to be true.
engSearchText: Well, well, well! I see my theory proved to be true.
jpnChrName: ハハ……！ 予想はしていましたが……！
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……！
予想はしていましたが……！

engChrName: You wanted a demonstration of my skills, correct? Perhaps we could make this a competition, then. For old time's sake.
engSearchText:
You wanted a demonstration of my skills, correct?
Perhaps we could make this a competition, then.
For old time's sake.
jpnChrName: 共同戦線を張るからには選んだ道で 新たに得たものを見せてもらうわ……！
jpnSearchText:
共同戦線を張るからには選んだ道で
新たに得たものを見せてもらうわ……！

engChrName: I'm curious to see which of us has grown more these past four years.
engSearchText:
I'm curious to see which of us has grown more these
past four years.
jpnChrName: そっちも確かめてみなさい── あたしがこの４年で掴んだ“力”を！！
jpnSearchText:
そっちも確かめてみなさい──
あたしがこの４年で掴んだ“力”を！！

engChrName: As am I. Let's do this!
engSearchText: As am I. Let's do this!
jpnChrName: ええ──望むところよ！！
jpnSearchText: ええ──望むところよ！！

engChrName: It's like we're watching the climax of a movie Judith's starring in.
engSearchText:
It's like we're watching the climax of a movie Judith's
starring in.
jpnChrName: ま、まるでコミックか 映画のクライマックスみたいだけど……！
jpnSearchText:
ま、まるでコミックか
映画のクライマックスみたいだけど……！

engChrName: The fires of their rivalry have been set ablaze!
engSearchText: The fires of their rivalry have been set ablaze!
jpnChrName: でも── どちらの闘気も本物ですっ！
jpnSearchText:
でも──
どちらの闘気も本物ですっ！

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnSearchText: ───ハッ……！！

engChrName: I think I'll add my own fuel to the fire.
engSearchText: I think I'll add my own fuel to the fire.
jpnChrName: 熱くさせてくれんじゃねぇか…… ならついでに俺も乗らせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
熱くさせてくれんじゃねぇか……
ならついでに俺も乗らせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Cao! I've got a score to settle, and I'm not gonna be satisfied until I beat the ever-loving shit outta you.
engSearchText:
Cao! I've got a score to settle, and I'm not gonna be
satisfied until I beat the ever-loving shit outta you.
jpnChrName: ツァオ──本気のアンタと 一度やり合うためにもなァ！！
jpnSearchText:
ツァオ──本気のアンタと
一度やり合うためにもなァ！！

engChrName: Are you serious, Aaron?!
engSearchText: Are you serious, Aaron?!
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……！？
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……！？

engChrName: So you gonna take him up on his offer?
engSearchText: So you gonna take him up on his offer?
jpnChrName: クク──だそうだが、 どうする《白蘭竜》さんよ？
jpnSearchText:
クク──だそうだが、
どうする《白蘭竜》さんよ？

engChrName: Heheh. Very well. I suppose I already had the pleasure of sparring with you recently, Van.
engSearchText:
Heheh. Very well. I suppose I already had the
pleasure of sparring with you recently, Van.
jpnChrName: フフ、いいでしょう。 ヴァンさんとは先日手合わせしましたし。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、いいでしょう。
ヴァンさんとは先日手合わせしましたし。

engChrName: I hold your potential in high regard, Little Conqueror.
engSearchText:
I hold your potential in high regard,
Little Conqueror.
jpnChrName: 私が買っている若者の一人──
jpnSearchText: 私が買っている若者の一人──

engChrName: Let's see if you managed to break out of your shell. Show me that my confidence in you is not misplaced!
engSearchText:
Let's see if you managed to break out of your shell.
Show me that my confidence in you is not misplaced!
jpnChrName: 《羅州の麒麟児》がどこまで殻を破れたか 存分に見せてもらいましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
《羅州の麒麟児》がどこまで殻を破れたか
存分に見せてもらいましょうか！

engChrName: I'll do more than that, you four-eyed bastard!
engSearchText:
I'll do more than that, you four-eyed
bastard!
jpnChrName: ハッ──上等だ！！
jpnSearchText: ハッ──上等だ！！

engChrName: Perhaps you should be the one to serve as referee this time.
engSearchText:
Perhaps you should be the one to serve as referee
this time.
jpnChrName: フ……ならば立ち会いは おぬしがやるべきであろうな。
jpnSearchText:
フ……ならば立ち会いは
おぬしがやるべきであろうな。

engChrName: Sure thing.
engSearchText: Sure thing.
jpnChrName: ええ──勿論です。
jpnSearchText: ええ──勿論です。

engChrName: Ready... Begin!
engSearchText: Ready... Begin!
jpnChrName: いざ尋常に───始め！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>いざ尋常に───始め！！

engChrName: Interesting. Very interesting.
engSearchText: Interesting. Very interesting.
jpnChrName: フフ……なるほど。
jpnSearchText: フフ……なるほど。

engChrName: The time you have spent under Van has clearly done wonders in drawing out your latent potential.
engSearchText:
The time you have spent under Van has clearly done
wonders in drawing out your latent potential.
jpnChrName: どうやらヴァンさんの所で 着実に研鑽を積んでいるようですね？
jpnSearchText:
どうやらヴァンさんの所で
着実に研鑽を積んでいるようですね？

engChrName: *pant* I've been seeing a hell of a lot of combat, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
*pant* I've been seeing a hell of a lot of combat, that's
for sure.
jpnChrName: はあはあはあ……実戦の機会だけは しこたまあったからな。
jpnSearchText:

jpnChrName: 共闘でそれを果たしたとあらば 幾許かの翳りも混ざりましょう。
jpnSearchText:
共闘でそれを果たしたとあらば
幾許かの翳りも混ざりましょう。

engChrName: Fair point.
engSearchText: Fair point.
jpnChrName: ふふ、まあそうなんだけど。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、まあそうなんだけど。

engChrName: Darn. And just when we came to an agreement, too...
engSearchText: Darn. And just when we came to an agreement, too...
jpnChrName: ちょっとちょっと…… 雲行きが怪しくなってきたわね。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとちょっと……
雲行きが怪しくなってきたわね。

engChrName: Now I'm even more curious about what you're really tryin' to do here.
engSearchText:
Now I'm even more curious about what you're really
tryin' to do here.
jpnChrName: 《斑鳩》の名を裏に響かせるか…… 何を狙ってるのかますます気になるが。
jpnSearchText:
《斑鳩》の名を裏に響かせるか……
何を狙ってるのかますます気になるが。

engChrName: Kurogane, was it? I understand you have your own reasons for intervening...
engSearchText:
Kurogane, was it? I understand you have your own
reasons for intervening...
jpnChrName: ──クロガネといったか。 そちらにも事情があるのだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──クロガネといったか。
そちらにも事情があるのだろう。

engChrName: ...but she already provided a verbal agreement to our proposal.
engSearchText:
...but she already provided a verbal agreement to
our proposal.
jpnChrName: だが、おぬしらの姫が しかと共闘の約定を口にしたのだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、おぬしらの姫が
しかと共闘の約定を口にしたのだ。

engChrName: It is unbecoming of a subordinate to speak out against his master's wishes.
engSearchText:
It is unbecoming of a subordinate to speak out against
his master's wishes.
jpnChrName: 臣下たるおぬしが 今さら反故にするというのか？
jpnSearchText:
臣下たるおぬしが
今さら反故にするというのか？

engChrName: Eh. It's no biggie. I'm used to his nagging.
engSearchText: Eh. It's no biggie. I'm used to his nagging.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私は別にいいけど？ いつもお小言ばかり言われてるし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私は別にいいけど？
いつもお小言ばかり言われてるし。

engChrName: Besides, I probably should've run it past you to begin with, so if you're that opposed, we can call this off.
engSearchText:
Besides, I probably should've run it past you to begin
with, so if you're that opposed, we can call this off.
jpnChrName: 相談もせずに決めちゃったし、 君が反対なら反故にしちゃおうか？
jpnSearchText:
相談もせずに決めちゃったし、
君が反対なら反故にしちゃおうか？

engChrName: No, no. The lion was correct—I well overstepped my bounds. You needn't go that far.
engSearchText:
No, no. The lion was correct—I well overstepped
my bounds. You needn't go that far.
jpnChrName: いえ──獅子殿の仰る通り、 出過ぎた意見でありました。
jpnSearchText:
いえ──獅子殿の仰る通り、
出過ぎた意見でありました。

engChrName: I will not oppose an alliance, but I will suggest we add one condition to its approval.
engSearchText:
I will not oppose an alliance, but I will suggest we add
one condition to its approval.
jpnChrName: 契約については承知しました── ですが“無条件”とは行きますまい。
jpnSearchText:
契約については承知しました──
ですが“無条件”とは行きますまい。

engChrName: I will test their abilities—personally.
engSearchText: I will test their abilities—personally.
jpnChrName: “我ら”の領域に着いてこられるか──
jpnSearchText: “我ら”の領域に着いてこられるか──

engChrName: If you pass, the agreement shall stand, but if you fail, it will be null and void.
engSearchText:
If you pass, the agreement shall stand, but if you fail,
it will be null and void.
jpnChrName: 敵う者なら良し、敵わぬ者であれば “足切り”させていただくとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
敵う者なら良し、敵わぬ者であれば
“足切り”させていただくとしよう。

engChrName: I see. So if we prove that we can compete on your level, then you'll allow it.
engSearchText:
I see. So if we prove that we can compete on your
level, then you'll allow it.
jpnChrName: っ……そういう事ですか。
jpnSearchText: っ……そういう事ですか。

engChrName: I suppose that's a fair condition...
engSearchText: I suppose that's a fair condition...
jpnChrName: ついて来られない者は ここで退場しろっての……！？
jpnSearchText:
ついて来られない者は
ここで退場しろっての……！？

engChrName: Haha. You're picking a fight with the wrong crew, maskface. Bring it.
engSearchText:
Haha. You're picking a fight with the wrong
crew, maskface. Bring it.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 上等じゃねえか覆面野郎。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
上等じゃねえか覆面野郎。

engChrName: You need only defeat me to pass my test.
engSearchText: You need only defeat me to pass my test.
jpnChrName: フフ、心配せずとも 検分は拙者だけで十分だ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、心配せずとも
検分は拙者だけで十分だ。

engChrName: In return, I only ask that the Roaring Lion stand aside. His abilities were never in question.
engSearchText:
In return, I only ask that the Roaring Lion
stand aside. His abilities were never in question.
jpnChrName: ただし獅子殿は引いて頂く── 確かめるべきは“それ以外”ゆえ。
jpnSearchText:
ただし獅子殿は引いて頂く──
確かめるべきは“それ以外”ゆえ。

engChrName: Got'cha. Why don't you be the referee, then, Master?
engSearchText: Got'cha. Why don't you be the referee, then, Master?
jpnChrName: ハン……そんじゃ師父（せんせい）に そちらも立ち会いは頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……そんじゃ師父（せんせい）に
そちらも立ち会いは頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Very well.
engSearchText: Very well.
jpnChrName: うむ、よかろう。
jpnSearchText: うむ、よかろう。

engChrName: No fair. You're always hogging all the fun.
engSearchText: No fair. You're always hogging all the fun.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ズルいなぁクロガネも。 自分一人だけ楽しんじゃって。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ズルいなぁクロガネも。
自分一人だけ楽しんじゃって。

engChrName: Oh, well. Guess I'll just kick back and watch you all go at it.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Guess I'll just kick back and watch you all
go at it.
jpnChrName: まあいいか、 しかと見届けさせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいか、
しかと見届けさせてもらうよ。

engChrName: I, Kurogane—intermediate-level shinobi and practitioner of the Rougetsu school—shall serve as your opponent.
engSearchText:
I, Kurogane—intermediate-level shinobi and
practitioner of the Rougetsu school—shall serve as
your opponent.
jpnChrName: ──侍衆《斑鳩》の中忍にして 《朧月流》の使い手、クロガネ。
jpnSearchText:
──侍衆《斑鳩》の中忍にして
《朧月流》の使い手、クロガネ。

engChrName: If you wish to form an alliance with Ikaruga, then prove your worth.
engSearchText:
If you wish to form an alliance with Ikaruga, then
prove your worth.
jpnChrName: 我らの協力者たり得るか否か 手ずから検分させていただく。
jpnSearchText:
我らの協力者たり得るか否か
手ずから検分させていただく。

engChrName: Those aren't mere shard-based illusions.
engSearchText: Those aren't mere shard-based illusions.
jpnChrName: シャードなどによる “偽装”ではありません……！
jpnSearchText:
シャードなどによる
“偽装”ではありません……！

engChrName: How's he doing that?! They can't be real... Can they?!
engSearchText: How's he doing that?! They can't be real... Can they?!
jpnChrName: この息吹……ぜんぶ本物！？
jpnSearchText: この息吹……ぜんぶ本物！？

engChrName: Nah. That's probably some ninja technique. Doubt that's a skill you can pick up at the Black God One Blade school.
engSearchText:
Nah. That's probably some ninja technique.
Doubt that's a skill you can pick up at the Black God
One Blade school.
jpnChrName: 《黒神一刀流》とも 一味違う忍びの技ってか……
jpnSearchText:
《黒神一刀流》とも
一味違う忍びの技ってか……

engChrName: Two of 'em are definitely phonies, though. We just gotta pick out the real one and beat the shit out of him!
engSearchText:
Two of 'em are definitely phonies, though. We just
gotta pick out the real one and beat the shit out
of him!
jpnChrName: 何とか連携して凌いで “本体”を見極めるぞ──！
jpnSearchText:
何とか連携して凌いで
“本体”を見極めるぞ──！

engChrName: Now, let us begin!
engSearchText: Now, let us begin!
jpnChrName: いざ──推して参る！
jpnSearchText: いざ──推して参る！

engChrName: Got'cha!
engSearchText: Got'cha!
jpnChrName: ──そこだ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>──そこだ！

engChrName: Gah!
engSearchText: Gah!

engChrName: And the victory goes to...Arkride Solutions!
engSearchText: And the victory goes to...Arkride Solutions!
jpnChrName: 勝負あり！
jpnSearchText: 勝負あり！

engChrName: Well done. Both sides fought admirably.
engSearchText: Well done. Both sides fought admirably.
jpnChrName: うむ、双方良い動きだった！
jpnSearchText: うむ、双方良い動きだった！

engChrName: Whew. Rougetsu's a real pain in the ass to fight against.
engSearchText:
Whew. Rougetsu's a real pain in the ass to
fight against.
jpnChrName: 《朧月流》……ここまで厄介とはな。
jpnSearchText: 《朧月流》……ここまで厄介とはな。

engChrName: Even so, you managed to pin down the real Kurogane fairly quickly. You really are full of surprises.
engSearchText:
Even so, you managed to pin down the real Kurogane
fairly quickly. You really are full of surprises.
jpnChrName: まあね──そちらも見事だ。 よく本物を見抜いたじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
まあね──そちらも見事だ。
よく本物を見抜いたじゃないか？

engChrName: Ehh, it ain't that impressive. I just employed a bit of martial arts trickery.
engSearchText:
Ehh, it ain't that impressive. I just employed a bit of
martial arts trickery.
jpnChrName: ま、ちょっと裏技めいた “勁”の使い方をしててな……
jpnSearchText:
ま、ちょっと裏技めいた
“勁”の使い方をしててな……

engChrName: Plus I got my trusty nose to guide my way.
engSearchText: Plus I got my trusty nose to guide my way.
jpnChrName: お前さんも言ってた通り、 それなりに鼻も利くんでね。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんも言ってた通り、
それなりに鼻も利くんでね。

engChrName: Ah, yes.
engSearchText: Ah, yes.
jpnChrName: ふうん……
jpnSearchText: ふうん……

engChrName: Very impressive.
engSearchText: Very impressive.

engChrName: Mr. Arkride never fails to amaze.
engSearchText: Mr. Arkride never fails to amaze.
jpnChrName: ふふ、流石はヴァン様かと。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、流石はヴァン様かと。

engChrName: It took everything I had to even keep up.
engSearchText: It took everything I had to even keep up.
jpnChrName: 正直……ついて行くのが やっとでしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
正直……ついて行くのが
やっとでしたけど……

engChrName: Well, then. Looks like we have a deal.
engSearchText: Well, then. Looks like we have a deal.
jpnChrName: ま、ともかくこれで めでたく合意に至ったわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ともかくこれで
めでたく合意に至ったわけだ。

engChrName: I'm sure we'll have some disagreements along the way, but we can deal with them as they come.
engSearchText:
I'm sure we'll have some disagreements along the
way, but we can deal with them as they come.
jpnChrName: これから三日間よろしく── 双方折り合う必要はありそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
これから三日間よろしく──
双方折り合う必要はありそうだけど。

engChrName: Works for me.
engSearchText: Works for me.
jpnChrName: ああ──それも承知の上だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──それも承知の上だ。

engChrName: I hope you can forgive me for my impudence.
engSearchText: I hope you can forgive me for my impudence.
jpnChrName: ──先程の無礼もお詫び致す。
jpnSearchText: ──先程の無礼もお詫び致す。

engChrName: Whoa!
engSearchText: Whoa!
jpnChrName: うわああっ！？
jpnSearchText: うわああっ！？

engChrName: Ack! D-Don't scare us like that! Give us a warning next time, at least!
engSearchText:
Ack! D-Don't scare us like that! Give us a warning
next time, at least!
jpnChrName: い、いつのまに…… てゆーか驚かせないでよっ！？
jpnSearchText:
い、いつのまに……
てゆーか驚かせないでよっ！？

engChrName: You ask the impossible. I am a shinobi who lives in the shadows. You will simply have to adjust to me...
engSearchText:
You ask the impossible. I am a shinobi who lives in
the shadows. You will simply have to adjust to me...
jpnChrName: フ……我らは影ゆえ、 慣れていただく他なかろう。
jpnSearchText:
フ……我らは影ゆえ、
慣れていただく他なかろう。

engChrName: ...and my dear twin brothers.
engSearchText: ...and my dear twin brothers.
jpnChrName: ──ちなみに先の二人は 拙者の三つ子の兄弟でな。
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみに先の二人は
拙者の三つ子の兄弟でな。

engChrName: What?! I thought they were clones!
engSearchText: What?! I thought they were clones!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ！？

engChrName: You're saying they were real-ass people?!
engSearchText: You're saying they were real-ass people?!
jpnChrName: 分け身じゃなくて そういうカラクリなのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
分け身じゃなくて
そういうカラクリなのかよ！？

engChrName: No. That was but a mere lighthearted jest.
engSearchText: No. That was but a mere lighthearted jest.
jpnChrName: 無論、冗談にござる。
jpnSearchText: 無論、冗談にござる。

engChrName: Haha. Don't worry, guys. You'll get used to him and his sense of humor soon enough.
engSearchText:
Haha. Don't worry, guys. You'll get used to him and
his sense of humor soon enough.
jpnChrName: フフ、まあすぐに慣れるよ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、まあすぐに慣れるよ。

engChrName: Like hell, we will!
engSearchText: Like hell, we will!
jpnChrName: 慣れるかああっ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>慣れるかああっ！！

engChrName: Shizuna and Kurogane will join you in the underground labyrinth expeditions. (They will not accompany you around town.)
engSearchText:
Shizuna and Kurogane will join you in the
underground labyrinth expeditions.
(They will not accompany you around town.)
jpnChrName: シズナ、クロガネが 地下の攻略時に同行するようになった。 ※街での活動には参加しません。
jpnSearchText:
シズナ、クロガネが
地下の攻略時に同行するようになった。
※街での活動には参加しません。

engChrName: Well, well. Looks like we have company.
engSearchText: Well, well. Looks like we have company.
jpnChrName: よう、《裏解決屋》じゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: よう、《裏解決屋》じゃねぇか。

engChrName: Oh, my. Our dear little problem solvers have come to say hello, it seems.
engSearchText:
Oh, my. Our dear little problem solvers have come to
say hello, it seems.
jpnChrName: あらまぁ、こないな所に 入り込んでくるやなんて。
jpnSearchText:
あらまぁ、こないな所に
入り込んでくるやなんて。

engChrName: The hell are you doing here? This is our turf.
engSearchText: The hell are you doing here? This is our turf.
jpnChrName: アン…… 何しにきやがったテメエら？
jpnSearchText:
アン……
何しにきやがったテメエら？

engChrName: Like the woman said, we're just droppin' by to say hi to our clients before the game starts.
engSearchText:
Like the woman said, we're just droppin' by to say hi
to our clients before the game starts.
jpnChrName: ま、ゲームが本格的に始まる前に 一応の依頼主に挨拶でもと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ゲームが本格的に始まる前に
一応の依頼主に挨拶でもと思ってな。

engChrName: We asked Renne to give us your location.
engSearchText: We asked Renne to give us your location.
jpnChrName: ちなみに居場所はレンから聞き出した。
jpnSearchText: ちなみに居場所はレンから聞き出した。

engChrName: That little snitch.
engSearchText: That little snitch.
jpnChrName: ハン、そういう事か。
jpnSearchText: ハン、そういう事か。

engChrName: *sigh* Our dear Renne used to be such a sweet kitten...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Our dear Renne used to be such a
sweet kitten...
jpnChrName: あの子かぁ……昔からめんこいから 可愛がってたモンなんやけど。
jpnSearchText:
あの子かぁ……昔からめんこいから
可愛がってたモンなんやけど。

engChrName: ...but then she ran away from home. Why did my little baby do this to me?
engSearchText:
...but then she ran away from home. Why did my
little baby do this to me?
jpnChrName: そのうち邪険にしてくるようになって 結社も辞めて、お姉さんさみしいわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
そのうち邪険にしてくるようになって
結社も辞めて、お姉さんさみしいわぁ。

engChrName: Probably 'cause your way of doting on your cats is... uh...extreme. That's what drove Kreuger away, too.
engSearchText:
Probably 'cause your way of doting on your cats is...
uh...extreme. That's what drove Kreuger away, too.
jpnChrName: オメーは猫可愛がりすぎんだよ。 それでクルーガーにも逃げられてるし。
jpnSearchText:
オメーは猫可愛がりすぎんだよ。
それでクルーガーにも逃げられてるし。

engChrName: You need to learn to give them some space. No one wants to be suffocated by you.
engSearchText:
You need to learn to give them some space. No one
wants to be suffocated by you.
jpnChrName: クク、しかも真綿でくるむように ジワジワ締め上げてくるからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、しかも真綿でくるむように
ジワジワ締め上げてくるからなぁ。

engChrName: ...Actually, some men might be into that.
engSearchText: ...Actually, some men might be into that.
jpnChrName: そりゃウザったられるだろ。 男なら喜ばれるかもしれねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃウザったられるだろ。
男なら喜ばれるかもしれねぇが。

engChrName: Then I need only find the right person. Perhaps one of these fine young men would like to accept my warm, tender embrace.
engSearchText:
Then I need only find the right person. Perhaps one
of these fine young men would like to accept my
warm, tender embrace.
jpnChrName: そう？　ならお兄はんたち相手に ギュウウッとさせてもらおかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
そう？　ならお兄はんたち相手に
ギュウウッとさせてもらおかなぁ。

engChrName: Or maybe the cute little kitty would be interested? I will gladly scoop her up and smother her with ALL of my affection. ❤
engSearchText:
Or maybe the cute little kitty would be interested?
I will gladly scoop her up and smother her with ALL
of my affection. ❤
jpnChrName: うふふ──なんならそっちの めんこい子も大歓迎やけど❤
jpnSearchText:
うふふ──なんならそっちの
めんこい子も大歓迎やけど❤

engChrName: I-I'll pass, thanks.
engSearchText: I-I'll pass, thanks.
jpnChrName: け、結構ですっ。
jpnSearchText: け、結構ですっ。

engChrName: You're actually pretty close to my type, but the scale dust is a turn off. I don't want that shit all over me.
engSearchText:
You're actually pretty close to my type, but the scale
dust is a turn off. I don't want that shit all over me.
jpnChrName: ハン……割とタイプだが ヤベエ鱗粉だらけっつーのはな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……割とタイプだが
ヤベエ鱗粉だらけっつーのはな。

engChrName: R-Really? That's the part that puts you off?
engSearchText: R-Really? That's the part that puts you off?
jpnChrName: そ、そういう問題なの？
jpnSearchText: そ、そういう問題なの？

engChrName: Anyway, I'm all for forming a pact and collaborating with you kids...
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm all for forming a pact and collaborating
with you kids...
jpnChrName: ──“共同戦線”については オジサンは別に構わないが……
jpnSearchText:
──“共同戦線”については
オジサンは別に構わないが……

engChrName: ...but you'll live to regret that decision till the day you die.
engSearchText:
...but you'll live to regret that decision till the day
you die.
jpnChrName: 間違いなく後悔するんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: 間違いなく後悔するんじゃねえか？

jpnChrName: へえ……？
jpnSearchText: へえ……？

engChrName: You can't be serious. That's what you're here for?
engSearchText: You can't be serious. That's what you're here for?
jpnChrName: マジか…… トチ狂ったんじゃねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
マジか……
トチ狂ったんじゃねえだろうな？

engChrName: You don't wanna do that. Take it from me—there isn't a bigger monster in all of Zemuria than this guy.
engSearchText:
You don't wanna do that. Take it from me—there
isn't a bigger monster in all of Zemuria than this guy.
jpnChrName: ──俺が言うのもなんだが、 このオヤジはマジモンの最悪だぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──俺が言うのもなんだが、

a little spice.

butter knife?

the Grandmaster gave it to me as a present.

you to die too quickly.
